name: acc-catalog
description: The online course catalog for Austin Community College
author: Instructional Web

scripts.archive: aws s3 sync --region 'us-west-2' s3://catalog.austincc.edu s3://catalog2018-2019.austincc.edu --delete --cache-control public,max-age=86400
scripts.devdeploy: aws s3 --region 'us-west-2' sync public/ s3://dev.catalog.austincc.edu --delete --exclude 'assets/*' --cache-control public,max-age=0
scripts.testdevdeploy: aws s3 --region 'us-west-2' sync public/ s3://dev.catalog.austincc.edu --delete --exclude 'assets/*' --cache-control public,max-age=0 --dryrun --size-only
scripts.proddeploy: ### DO NOT REMOVE THIS UNTIL READY TO PUBLISH ### aws s3 --region 'us-west-2' sync public/ s3://catalog.austincc.edu --delete --exclude 'assets/*' --cache-control public,max-age=86400
scripts.testproddeploy: git checkout master && aws s3 --region 'us-west-2' sync public/ s3://catalog.austincc.edu --delete --exclude 'assets/*' --cache-control public,max-age=86400 --dryrun
